dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: Split CIFAR-10 divides the original CIFAR-10 dataset into 5 tasks, with each task composed of 2 classes. Each class includes 5000 training and 1000 testing images of shape 32×32.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: Split CIFAR-100 divides CIFAR-100 into 10 tasks, with 10 classes per task. Each class has 500 training and 100 testing images of shape 32×32.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Stanford
dcterms:description: Split TinyImageNet splits TinyImageNet into 10 tasks, with 20 classes per task. Each class contains 500 training images, 50 validation images, and 50 testing images.
dcterms:title: Split TinyImageNet

dcterms:creator: Sylvestre-Alvise Rebuffi
Alexander Kolesnikov
Georg Sperl
Christoph H Lampert
dcterms:description: ImageNet100 is a subset of ImageNet, split into 10 tasks with 10 classes per task, used for incremental classifier and representation learning.
dcterms:title: ImageNet100
